forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 65F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
